long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Apple Search Ads Extension by Appvector :

Unlock powerful keyword insights with the Apple Search Ads Extension by Appvector. This essential tool integrates seamlessly with the Apple Ads dashboard, offering real-time keyword popularity scores to optimize your app's visibility and drive more downloads.
Key Features:

=> Valuable Keyword Metrics: Gain access to detailed keyword insights and popularity scores directly from Apple, helping you make informed decisions.
=> Real-Time Data: Harness up-to-date popularity scores to stay ahead of the competition and fine-tune your keyword strategy.
=> Seamless Integration: Works effortlessly on the Apple Ads dashboard, providing valuable metrics on the Add Keyword page and Keyword Recommendation page.
=> Optimize Ad Campaigns: Select the best-performing keywords to enhance your ad campaigns and maximize your app's reach.

Boost your appâ€™s performance on the Apple App Store by leveraging the power of keyword data with the Apple Search Ads Extension by Appvector. Perfect for developers and marketers looking to improve their app's discoverability and drive downloads.

Note: To get the token please visit: https://appvector.io/users/get_token?utm_source=apple_search_ads
